    More than 35 years of industry experience in the built environment

    Coriolis International Ltd  is our consultancy business that supports organisations deliver professional services and skilled personnel in the HVACR industry.

    After a long established career in the built environment working with highly skilled professionals and prestigious organisations throughout the world, Mark Forsyth established the Coriolis business in 2006 to deliver change and skills competency in the industry.

    Apart from a wide range of Refrigeration, Air Conditioning, Heat Pump, Flame Brazing and Joining of Materials training and assessment courses; Mark was party to content & development of the first edition of the CIBSE TM44 guideline for the regular inspection of AC systems.

    Widely respected across the UK and internationally for his knowledge and skills development strategies; Mark also developed the first Fgas & ODS 2079 subject matter content for City and Guilds ‘smartscreen’ on line learning portal.

    Mark is the project manager, lead judge and driving force behind the RACHP industry vocational competition known affectionately as skillFRIDGE and was chief expert for Worldskills International London 2011.

    If the above wasn’t enough, Mark is proud of his engagement to Worldskillskills UK as training manager for Refrigeration and Air Conditioning, and has relished the unique opportunity to have developed numerous young RAC apprentices from national competition success to Worldskills International vocational skill competition medal winning positions since 2011.

    It takes a better person to build a better world

    After working with Celsius Training Ltd since 2006, Coriolis International Ltd now owns Celsius Training Ltd and continues to deliver skills training and assessment under the Celsius brand, and delivers AC system inspections, asset verification and condition surveys within the Coriolis International brand.

    Our mantra – ‘it takes a better person to build a better world’.

    Our mission is to build a positive attitude and behavior that supports learning the best ways to achieve goals that lead to opportunity for individuals and organisations.
